original: Berggren, Karl Fredrik Robert, tullförvaltare, Visby, f. 10/8/83 i Visby av köpm. C. J. B. o. Wilhelmina Berg. — Studiex. OL Tullförv. i Visby sed. 27, skeppsmätare ised. 06. Ordf. i Visby allm. sångfören. sed. 25, v. ordf. i Gotl. sàngiförb. o. Musikal. sälls’k., kassaförvalt. i Kyrkosångens vänner, led. a. kyrkofullm. RVO, Patr-GM, Go’tl. ’sång:förb. GM, Sv. sàngiförb. förtjt.
translated: Berggren, Karl Fredrik Robert, customs manager, Visby, born on August 10th, 1883 in Visby to the merchant C. J. B. and Wilhelmina Berg. He graduated from OL and became a customs manager in Visby in 1927, and a ship surveyor in 1906. He was the chairman of the Visby public singing association since 1925, deputy chairman of the Gotland singing association and musical society. He also served as the treasurer of the Friends of Church Music and was a member of the church's board of trustees. He received the Royal Order of Vasa, Patriotic Society Medal and was honored by the Gotland Singing Association Guild and the Swedish Singing Association. He got married to his partner in the year of 19xx.
